comment: TAKE HER. She is hilarious and keeps your attention. She also gives the chance for you to get bonus points. She does give pop quizzes but goes over the material in class before she gives the quiz. I would definitely recommend her!

I love this teacher. McIntyre for PRESIDENT!!! NO TESTS!!! Just weekly summaries, a group presentation, and an 7-10 pg essay on the topic of your choices. I wish she could teach the rest of my Sociology classes. I love the way she laughs. She is too pretty to be a professor.
I love this teacher. McIntyre for PRESIDENT!!!

Excellent professor! I took the 8am class and never missed a day because I WANTED to hear her lecture. She gives you all the material you need for tests and gives extra credit opportunities. She is hilarious and gives examples that are very relatable. First prof. I've ever had that actually made me want to learn. TAKE HER! You wont regret it.

BEST PROFESSOR. Hilarious lectures and you'll actually want to go to class. Super nice and super understanding. Gives surprise quizzes that are extremely easy and raise your grade. NO tests are cummulative, so the tests are easy to study for. Loved this class. Funniest professor ive had so far

Had the 8 am class but it was so worth it. Tests were simple and easy to study for. Pay attention to her references to pop culture-they are usually extra credit questions on the tests. She's obsessed with Queen, tell her you love Freddy Mercury. Focuses a lot on medicine and HIV/AIDS. Really funny. Does extra credit outside the tests

Really easy professor. If you pay attention in class and take notes you should easily get a B or higher. She's very engaging and often had open discussions with the class about current issues. Attendance was run by signing a paper that was passed around.

She is awesome! I wish more professors were like her. She teaches you what you need to know and in a  clear and easy way. Always down to help you out and goes by her syllabus. I took her as an 8 am and even liked going because class was always interesting. Take her!

She is a GREAT teacher! Very helpful and funny. She knows what she's talking about. Very straightforward syllabus and grades. Attendance is taken, but it's honestly a fun class to attend. The book is required, but not difficult to read. I truly recommend her as a teacher!

I completely loved Prof. McIntyre's class. Always looked foward to attending. She is so funny, and extremely helpful. If someone needed extra help she was up for study groups. Every topic was fun- Posts grades quickly. Gives great examples & nvr left you confused. SUCH A GREAT CLASS & PROF!!! I Would def. take her again and recommend her to anyone.
